title: Se Sobreviver Case
overview: A partner will have to change couples, having to survive with another person entirely different by spending the night in his tent. Participants are allowed to share objects.If You Survive, Marry!  is a Brazilian reality show, co-produced by Floresta Produções and shown by Multishow.The program aims to test couples in an environmental reserve, in the heart of the Atlantic Forest in São Paulo, going through several moments in a survival challenge.
